meanings.definition: Of or relating to the dark pigment in skin, hair, and eyes.
meanings.sent1: The melanian color of her hair was striking against her fair skin.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a melanian palette to create a beautiful portrait.
meanings.sent3: The melanian shade of the curtains made the room feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was a melanian blanket dotted with stars.
meanings.sent5: The melanian clouds signaled an impending storm.

meanings.definition: A person with dark skin, hair, and eyes.
meanings.sent1: She admired the melanian beauty of her friend's features.
meanings.sent2: The melanian at the party stood out with their elegant attire.
meanings.sent3: The melanian in the office always had the best jokes to share.
meanings.sent4: The melanian on the team was a star player in every match.
meanings.sent5: The melanian in the photograph had a captivating smile.
